Class ScrollableComponent

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IContainer<IHorizontalComponent>

    public abstract class ScrollableComponent
extends HorizontalContainer
    Composite container containing a scroll component, which can be scrolled using scroll bars.
